snippet.title: Supreme League of Patriots Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Phoenix Online Publishing is teaming up with No Bull Intentions to bring you the satirical adult comedy, Supreme League of Patriots. Introducing Kyle Keever, an aspiring actor down on his luck. Through a freak accident he becomes his alter-ego the Purple Patriot, a controversial and overly exaggerated parody of conservative America all in an attempt to win the next ‘America’s Got Superpowers’ competition. Joining our hero in his not-so-altruistic quest is Mel the liberal, sarcastic and very left-wing sidekick. See the sights, explore New York city and meet a slew of characters whom you’d probably never want to meet in real life all for the fleeting glory of winning a reality show.

All three issues of Supreme League of Patriots will be releasing on January 29th for PC, Mac and Linux on Steam, Humble Store and the Phoenix Online Store. Season Passes will be priced at $14.99 with the option to purchase each individual episode for $5.99. Pre-orders of the game are available now at a 10% discount.

Join the Purple Patriot as he becomes the hero New York neither needs or deserves in this politically incorrect adventure for fame, glory and reality TV ratings!

See More At: http://www.postudios.com/company/games/supremeleague/index.php

Pre-Order now: http://store.postudios.com/products/supreme-league-of-patriots-season-pass

Follow us on:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/PhoenixOnlineStudios
Twitter: https://twitter.com/POStudios
Tumblr: http://postudios.tumblr.com/
